mapper.update: UPDATE blame SET mem_no = #{mem_no:INTEGER}, target_mem_no = #{target_mem_no:INTEGER}, blame_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), blame_del_check = #{blame_del_check:BOOLEAN} WHERE blame_no = #{blame_no:INTEGER}
